data.title: Thandiwe Newton breaks her silence after 'separating from husband of 24 years Ol Parker'

Thandiwe Newton has broken her social media silence following reports she has split from her husband of 24 years Ol Parker and is âheading to rehabâ.

The actress, 49, shared a cryptic message about âhating womenâ, as she took to Instagram to post a picture of a white strappy dress on Monday.

The Hollywood star, who has reportedly been urged to seek mental health support following the break-up, posted the snap of the Zoe Buckman dress which was embroidered with the words: âDo we hate our womenâ.

The now-deleted post comes shortly after it was alleged she has separated from her husband and is likely headed to rehab, according to a new report.

Speaking out: Thandiwe Newton has broken her social media silence following reports she has split from her husband of 24 years Ol Parker

The report came four days after Thandiwe, denied claims she was sacked from her leading role in Magic Mike 3 over a heated argument with co-star Channing Tatum. She has since been replaced in the role by Salma Hayek.

According to a new report in Page Six, staffers on the movie became worried about her health during filming in London, with her agent flying in from Los Angeles to try and âsmooth things overâ.

The publication reports that Thandiwe has been suffering with emotional and family problems after separating from her husband Ol, 52, with whom she shares children Ripley, 21, Nico, 17, and Booker, eight.

Ol is a British filmmaker who previously wrote and directed the 2018 musical film Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again.

âDo we hate our women?â The actress, 49, shared a cryptic message about âhating womenâ, as she took to Instagram to post a picture of a white strappy dress on Monday

A source said: âThandiwe had been acting strange on set, she has been very highly strung. Her apparent breakdown caused so much disruption, it became clear she couldnât play the role.

âThere is a lot going on in her personal life, she and her husband have separated. She seemed so stressed she even brought her two pet rabbits to her hotel for emotional support.â

A Warner Bros. Pictures spokesperson previously said of her departure from the movie: âThandiwe Newton has made the difficult decision to step away from the production of Warner Bros. Picturesâ Magic Mikeâs Last Dance to deal with family matters.â

Stepping out: Channing Tatum was seen for the first time since his Magic Mike 3 co-star Thandiwe Newton exited the film following claims of an âon-set bust-upâ

Quit: The actress recently denied claims she was sacked from her leading role in Magic Mike 3 over a heated argument with co-star Channing Tatum

The insider added that Thandiwe fired her UK agent of three decades as her US agent Gaby Morgerman flew in to try to help.

Gaby is considered one of the most powerful women in Hollywood, representing stars including Matthew McConaughey and Minnie Driver over her thirty year career at powerhouse agency William Morris.

Thandiwe has reportedly fired her UK team at London based agency Independent Talent Group in recent weeks.

The insider said of her next steps: âThandiweâs team wants her to go to rehab for mental health support.

She was supposed to leave immediately for a facility, they tried for a Malibu rehab, but they couldnât take her. Arrangements are now being made to go to a facility in Arizona, if she agrees to go.â

Family: The couple share three children Ripley, 21, Nico, 17, and Booker, eight (pictured with her husband and daughters in 2019)

MailOnline contacted representatives of Thandiwe Newton for comment.

Thandiwe exited Magic Mikeâs Last Dance after 11 days of filming with Channing due to a âfamily matterâ.

Last week The Sun reported the alleged argument between Thandiwe and Channing, which was said to be âunimaginably viciousâ, was over Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars.

A Warner Bros. Pictures spokesperson said: âThandiwe Newton has made the difficult decision to step away from the production of Warner Bros. Picturesâ Magic Mikeâs Last Dance to deal with family matters.â

The statement comes after insiders told The Sun that Thandiwe is planning on suing studio chiefs at Warner Bros over the incident.

The argument reportedly took place on location in Paddington and culminated with Channing driving off set in his car.

A source said: âChanning Tatum is the producer and number one on set. Thandiwe Newton is the number two star. But 11 days into shooting and itâs all over.

âThey fell out over the debacle at The Oscars. I was on set. I watched her and watched him. They were in and out of the house where we were filming having this confrontation.

âAfter the row he just went, âI am not working with her anymoreâ. Him being a producer, itâs his movie, so sheâs off the movie.â

A spokesperson for Thandiwe told MailOnline: âThis report is completely inaccurate.â

The original Magic Mike movie premiered in 2012 and was loosely based on Channingâs experience working as a stripper in Tampa, Florida. A sequel followed in 2015.

Channing confirmed that he would reprise his role for Magic Mikeâs Last Dance in November on 2021.

The film is set to premiere exclusively on HBO Max. The release date has yet to be announced.

In a recent interview with PEOPLE he spoke about the importance on the movie having a lead female character.

âI want to have an equal, if not even more centralized female character for Mike to really play off of and almost toâ¦ I donât want to say, [to have her] take the baton, but really let the movie be about a femaleâs experience and not Mikeâs experience, because it has been so much about Mike and the guysâ experiences.

âThese movies are very, very female-forward. At least that is our intention.â

Born in London, Newton grew up in Penzance, Cornwall, where her parents â her dad is white British, her mother black, from Zimbabwe â sent her to a Catholic school. She said of her school years: âI was aware that I didnât fit. I was the black, atheist kid in the all-white, Catholic school run by nunsâ.

âItâs very unusual to have writers around on set because directors donât want them there. But they love having Ol around. He was on set every day and I fell madly in love with him,â she told InStyle Magazine.

In a 2019 interview Thandiwe revealed she lost acting roles because she spoke out about sexual abuse in the past.

When she was 16 she was groomed by director John Duigan, who was 39 years old at the time.

The violations by Duigan lasted five years, two of those years were termed a ârelationshipâ after he sought Newtonâs parentsâ blessing for her to be his girlfriend when she was 18, while asking her to hide their previous intimacy which began when she was just 16.

The star said she terminated a contract with a publicist who begged her to stop talking about being sexually abused because it was ânot good for your reputationâ.

In 1996 Thandiwe sought help after suffering from an eating disorder, which she explained stemmed from her previous sexual abuse.

âI was lying in bed, so thin, and my heart was beating against my ribcage so hard that I could see it, and my friend Jessica called. I beat the fact that my mom was depressed a lot of my life and my dad has anger issues. Stuff that they passed on that Iâm kind of mad they gave meâ.
